channel.title: Item to one door
channel.description:
how can you make it so when you use an item you can open to a specific door. there is more than one door i want to use the object on.
ex. there are like 5 magic doors.
there are no magic doors in rs(i think) but how do i do so that the item only works on one of those 5 doors?

item.title: Item to one door
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

deathschaos9:

On Delta I believe its UsedOnX and UsedOnY.

worked out great! thanks!

Read full topic

ex. there are like 5 magic doors.

there are no magic doors in rs(i think) but how do i do so that the item only works on one of those 5 doors?
[/quote]
Base.[/quote][quote=“jaruanna, post:1, topic:375707”]how can you make it so when you use an item you can open to a specific door. there is more than one door i want to use the object on.

ex. there are like 5 magic doors.

there are no magic doors in rs(i think) but how do i do so that the item only works on one of those 5 doors?[/quote]

im sorry guys… it is a delta 317(i know, but i am a new coder)

deathchaos9, i did something like that but i put coordX, should it have been objectX?

Read full topic

item.title: Item to one door
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Item on object packet. (192)

if (object == DOOR && objectX == #### && objectY == ####) { if (item == ITEM_ID) { // Do whatever with your door } else { // They didn't have the right item. } }

Obviously this code wont work, but its a basic draft of what you could do. I would be able to offer accurate assistance if I knew the base.

Read full topic
